revised_title: The Poisonous Root Lately Found Mixed Among the Gentian
tldr: The authors report on a poisonous root found mixed with Gentian, a medicinal plant used in various remedies. They describe its effects on humans and conduct experiments on dogs to understand its properties. The root, which has not yet been named, is greyish-brown, acrid, and pungent, and has caused serious health issues and even death in some cases. The authors recommend that apothecaries examine their Gentian carefully and reject any that is not genuine.
